line2: Due to the huge success of our £10,000 first trade prize we have just relaunched it and all who either have or do place a trade before 2pm BST on November 21st will be entered in to win. We couldn’t make it any easier.
line3: Don’t miss out on this opportunity to enter your £10,000 draw to celebrate our existing new partnership and as you know by now, also receive a larger bonus, more markets and far more support.Trade made easy.
line4: PipIndex and Academy of Financial Trading look forward to continuing to support you.
